name: Gold Digger
overview: Gold Digger is a simple maze collect 'em up for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum. The goal of the game is to collect all the gold in the maze while avoiding the snake/worm-like enemies that crawl around the maze, as well as avoiding the stationary boulders. Gold Digger was developed by Gary Capewell and published by Blaby Computer Games in 1983.
